documents.document:
R-Patz, Stewart to meet at awards?

Robert Pattinson and Kristen Stewart look set for their first public encounter since the actress' cheating scandal broke.The Twilight couple - whose romance is thought to be on the rocks after Kristen confessed to a fling with married director Rupert Sanders - are expected to be reunited next month as they are due to present trophies at the MTV Video Music Awards in LA, reported the Daily Mirror.An insider said the event could be "a real embarrassment", and added: "The idea was for them to jointly present awards but that is looking unlikely now."If they go up on stage at the same time fans will believe they are united again. If Kristen goes up alone the crowd reaction will be astonishing. Fans have bought into the romance on and off screen so she could be in for a horrible night."Earlier this week R-Patz, who reportedly moved out of the couple's home after pictures of Kristen with Rupert emerged, returned to the spotlight for a series of media appearances, including a chat on US programme The Daily Show.While he dodged host Jon Stewart's questions about his relationship, it has been reported that he was "devastated" when he discovered that Kristen had cheated on him.The actress has also kept a low profile after admitting to her fling with her Snow White And The Huntsman director, which she referred to as a "momentary indiscretion" in a statement apologising for her actions.Read more: http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Leonardo DiCaprio, Tobey Maguire and Tom Hardy Team Up for A

Great Gatsby goes to...Africa?! But swap the lavish dresses and tuxes for guns and the all-night parties for the dangerous world of poaching. Then pop in The Dark Knight Rises' Darth Vader-esque villain, and you've got yourself quite the movie.
While that rather bizarre combination isn't likely to arrive in a cinema near you anytime soon, Leonardo DiCaprio, Tobey Maguire and Tom Hardy will be teaming up for a new movie at Warner Bros., claims The Hollywood Reporter.
Hardy came up with the idea for the still-untitled film, which will center on poaching and animal trafficking, assumingly predominately from an anti-poaching perspective (the original idea was inspired by friends of the actor who went from Special Forces operatives to fighting for animals).
Are Leonardo DiCaprio and Robert Pattinson planning a boys weekend?
According to THR, the movie will be inspired by Steven Soderbergh's Traffic, as a "multistory take on the various impacts of the war on drugs. In this case, the story would look at everything from the ground war on poachers in the African savanna to how animal material ends up in the fashion houses of Paris."
Hardy, Maguire and DiCaprio (who has long been an animal-rights activist, even becoming spokesperson for the International Fund for Animal Welfare) will all produce the movie, but no decision has been announced as to whether they'll appear in the movie as well.
We're thinking this brand of drama will be too much for them to turn away, though.
More from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Sporty and Scary's drunk fight

THEY have sung about girl power and being friends forever but it seems things weren't always rosy between Mel B and Mel C.
Sporty Spice (aka Melanie Chisholm) has divulged details of a fight between the two feisty girls, which happened when they were drunk.
"Me and Melanie had a fight once. We were too drunk. We got a bit pushy, shovey and Geri stepped in the middle to break it up and ended up getting punched in the face. Then Melanie went off to be sick, and because she'd been drinking too much port she accused me of making her bleed!"
But the two put their differences behind them, reuniting with the rest of the Spice crew for a hugely successful Olympic Closing Ceremony performance.
Was it so good that they'll get back together?
‘No,’ Mel told the Daily Mail.
"We have no plans to get together again. We all lead such different lives now"

Read more: http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com/

Kim Kardashian and Old Navy settle lawsuit over ad

Kim Kardashian has settled a lawsuit against Old Navy claiming the clothing retailer violated her publicity rights by using a lookalike in an ad.
It's not her: A commercial for Old Navy featured Melissa Molinaro.
Kardashian sued over the spot in July 2011, claiming the company's use of a model who looked like her might confuse consumers about her actual endorsements, which include a clothing store and shoe line.
No details about the settlement were filed with the court.
"The lawsuit was resolved to the mutual satisfaction of the parties," the two sides said in a joint statement.
The lawsuit was over a commercial titled "Super C-U-T-E," which featured Canadian singer-model Melissa Molinaro. The ad began airing in February 2011 and was still being used in some of the company's promotions months later, Kardashian's lawsuit stated.
An attorney for Old Navy said at a January hearing that Molinaro was famous in her own right and her appearance in the ad wasn't intended to draw similarities to the reality TV starlet.
Kardashian's attorney Gary Hecker contended that some news outlets and Twitter users noted similarities in the women's appearances.
Kardashian, 31, was seeking unspecified damages and an order barring Old Navy from using a lookalike model again.
Read more from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Made In Chelsea's Binky Felstead flaunts pale patch on side

MADE In Chelsea brunette Binky Felstead stepped out in a very low-cut gown for the National Reality TV Awards last night.
Cheska Hull and Ollie Locke's BFF showed off a lot of cleavage as she posed for pictures and teamed the LBD with a cream blazer.
Standing with her hand on her hip and showing off a lot of side-boob, Binky revealed a suspect pale patch which suggested she had missed a spot whilst fake tanning.
Clinging onto a matching orange clutch bag, the star revealed her chest was starkly contrasting the rest of her skin tone.
Her attempt to achieve side-boob definitely worked a source tells us she even took a second to glance down herself.
Holding her head high, Binks pouted for snaps on the red carpet which she hit with fellow MIC stars.
Read more from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Kim Kardashian Struggles To Contain Cleavage In Plunging Dre

Kim Kardashian looked a little uncomfortable in her outfit while out with boyfriend Kanye West on Sunday, struggling to contain her clevage in the revealing dress.
The 31-year-old was spotted on a shopping trip with her rapper beau in New York City's Soho yesterday afternoon, and while Kanye was paying her the utmost attention, she seemed a little preoccupied trying to fix her outfit.
Attempting to be fashion-forward, Kim wore a sleeveless suit dress which showed off her ample clevage in a plunging neckline, however, it may have been a little too revealing as the button holding the dress together kept popping open.
The pair were enjoying a relaxing day after attending the 'Made In America' music festival the day before, where Kanye performed alongside the event's organiser Jay-Z.
Jay-Z and his wife Beyonce were said to have kept their distance from Kim as they are furious with her for supposedly making harsh comments about Jay's Roc Nation artist, Rita Ora.
Read more from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Kate and Pippa 'designer's delight'

The Duchess of Cambridge and her sister Pippa Middleton are "wonderful girls to dress and wonderful girls to be around", British fashion designer Alice Temperley has revealed.
The designer, who has also dressed stars such as Jennifer Lopez and Demi Moore, said it was flattering to see the sisters in her creations.
She was speaking at the launch of her Somerset collection at John Lewis in central London.
She said: "Awareness is good for any brand and they're wonderful girls to dress and wonderful girls to be around, so I think it's all flattering.
"It's just as flattering though to see somebody walking down the street in something as well.
"For me, it's really about people looking good and enjoying the clothes no matter who they are," she said.
Temperley designed the decadent gown Kate wore to the premiere of the War Horse film earlier this year, with pictures of the elegant Duchess beamed around the world.
The Duchess's sister was in the front row of Temperley's London Fashion Week show last September and was dressed by the designer for the evening reception of the royal wedding.
On her collection for this year's London Fashion Week later this month, Temperley said it would be "chic, elegant and quite minimal".
The opening of Temperley's John Lewis collection attracted a number of fashion fans, with a queue of about 70 people stretching around the outside of the store on Oxford Street.
Read more from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Kim Kardashian's repeated attempts to befriend Beyonce goes

Despite Kim Kardashian’s repeated attempts to befriend Bey, a source tells Confidenti@l that the 16-time Grammy winner gave Kardashian a serious reality check on Saturday night.
A source at the Made in America Festival in Philadelphia, where both Beyonce and Kardashian were supporting their musical men, tells us, “Kim and Beyonce barely spoke to each other.” Adding, “They were on opposite sides of the stage. Beyonce didn’t even acknowledge [Kardashian] was there until the concert was almost over.”
The situation was made extra awkward since Kanye West, Kardashian’s fling of nearly five months, and Jay-Z are best pals. West was even a surprise performer during Hova’s set that night.
But we hear it wasn’t just Beyonce giving the cold shoulder this time around. “(Kardashian) didn’t make any efforts to go speak to Beyonce either,” the source says. Instead, she spent her time hanging out with best friend Jonathan Cheban and West, when he wasn’t performing.
Eventually, the women “made small talk in the dressing room, but you could tell Kim was uncomfortable. She clung onto Kanye the entire time and didn’t say much,” according to a second source.
“(Kardashian) was talking to Jonathan, and Kanye was talking to Jay-Z and Beyonce,” the insider says, adding that Kardashian did tell Jay-Z how much she loved his show.
Despite the quiet cattiness, Kardashian and Beyonce could have bonded over the fact that both ladies are watching their waistlines.
As Confidential recently reported, Kardashian is trying to downsize her famous derriere to fit into West’s fashion line. The insider says Beyonce had chef Anthony DiRienzo from STARR Restaurants, whose eateries Buddakkan and Morimoto had a VIP tent for celebrities at the show, prepare a dairy-free meal for her, including a chicken quesadilla with no cheese and watermelon tomato salad. Jay-Z and Beyonce were such fans of the grub, they asked for a doggy bag to take aboard their private jet Sunday.
Jason Segel and girlfriend Michelle Williams and her daughter, Matilda, went wild over the holiday weekend. The trio took a trip to the Bronx Zoo, where they checked out giraffes, gorillas and the Madagascar exhibit.
“They were really cute together,” says an observer. “Jason was very attentive to Matilda and was teaching her about the animals.”
Segel and Williams reunited on the East Coast after spending time in L.A. together last week. According to our source, the trip to the zoo was Segel’s idea and it went over well with 6-year-old Matilda, whose father, actor Heath Ledger, died when she was 2. “She was so comfortable with [Segel],” says our source, adding, “She was thrilled to be there and see all the animals.”
Read more:http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

That's one eye-popping outfit! Kim Kardashian commands atte

She’s famous for her curves and it seems that Kim Kardashian was in the mood to show them off last night.
The reality star, 31, donned a daring, and rather revealing, monochrome dress to attend a magazine launch party in New York.
Kim had squeezed her ample chest into the plunging backless dress, which boasted cut out detail around the straps and sides, ensuring plenty of flesh was on show.
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians’ star had her raven locks pulled back into a pony tail to further highlight the unusual and striking detail of her outfit.
It wasn’t just her chest on display, the white skirt of the dress also cupped her famous derriere and she finished off the look with a pair of strappy black heels.
Kim stepped out without her beau Kanye West and attended the bash with her best friend Jonathan Cheban instead.
The duo joined the hosts of the bash Jason Binn, Christy Turlington Burns and Bruce Weber at Capitale in the Big Apple.
Kim and Jonathan were seen mingling with other guests including Russell Simmons, Alexis Welch, Amar'e Stoudemire and Daisy Fuentes at the glitzy bash.
As ever Kim was more than happy to keep her fans updated on her movements at the bash and tweeted a series of snaps.
In one picture the reality star is seen nestled between Jonathan and Rachel Roy and Kim is seen pouting into the camera.
Yesterday Kim revealed that she believes her rapper boyfriend Kanye is her ‘perfect match’ and she admitted she wants children.
Speaking on The View she said: 'In a perfect world you know when you find someone that you really think is your perfect match.'
The 31-year-old was instantly asked, 'is he?' to which a blushing Kim replied, 'I think so.'
'I definitely think anything I'd be in now is a permanent relationship,' she said.
Kim even alluded to the two starting a family. 'Kids is definitely something I want,' she said. 'I think I wanted that before.'
While Kim is looking to the future Kanye has been referencing the past and he mentions the sex tape that made Kim famous in a new track.
The song - which was leaked to website TMZ and will feature on his album Cruel Summer - includes the line: 'Eat breakfast at Gucci. My girl a superstar all from a home movie.'
Read more from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com/

Kristen Stewart barefoot and headstrong at 'On The Road'

When Kristen Stewart emerged from a large black car Thursday night in front of Toronto's Ryerson Theatre for the North American premiere of her new movie, "On the Road," the big-screen adaptation of Jack Kerouac’s classic Beat generation novel, flashbulbs popped, cellphones were raised, and then, in a moment of silence, one sound landed with a crashing thud.

A single boo.

It was an instant -- yet the seemingly only-- acknowledgment of the actress' recent role in the tabloids, where she's been a near constant fixture since news broke of a late-summer cheating scandal involving Stewart and filmmaker Rupert Sanders. The "On the Road" premiere was billed as her first public appearance since reports of her affair with the director of her film "Snow White and the Huntsman" emerged in July, sullying her relationship with her "Twilight" saga costar Robert Pattinson.

Stewart and her "On the Road" costars Garrett Hedlund and Kirsten Dunst stayed on the festival's red carpet for what seemed an eternity, moving back and forth between professional photographers on one side and fans on the other. Stewart, in a slinky sequined sheath, eventually kicked off her high heels and signed autographs in her bare feet.

When the program finally got started a full hour behind schedule, the festival's director and chief executive, Piers Handling, spoke of the novel “On the Road,” saying “poetry, sex and drugs was its currency.” He introduced director Walter Salles by noting that having previously made “The Motorcycle Diaries,” “he has the road in his blood.”

"On the Road" had received mixed reviews following its unveiling earlier this year at the Cannes Film Festival and has since been trimmed by some 15-20 minutes.

Stewart is first seen in the film lying topless on a dingy mattress, and throughout she displays, by turns, raw sexuality and more troubled reserve. The strength of her performance as Marylou -- and equally strong turns from Dunst, Amy Adams and Elisabeth Moss in small roles supporting Hedlund's Dean Moriarty and Sam Riley's Sal Paradise -- gives Salles' "On the Road" an oddly feminist bent.

After the screening, Salles recalled reading the book as a youth in Brazil -- it “embodied for me the possibility to invent a new future where all freedom was possible,” he said.

Stewart, who donned a pair of leather high-top basketball sneakers for the Q&A session, briefly noted the nudity required for the role, but quickly pivoted to speaking about her research into the real-life counterpart for her character, LuAnne Henderson. The first wife of Neal Cassady (Kerouac's inspiration for Dean Moriarty), Henderson, Stewart said, “even now she’d be this really incredible person.”

Perhaps tellingly, Stewart added that Henderson's relationship with Cassady was “not something she ever sold, not something she ever capitalized on. It was her first love.”

She praised Salles and Hedlund for always being there for her during filming, but she said all she really ever needed to do was think of Henderson and “look up. She was so … there for me.”

Read more: http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

David Beckham Brings Harper to Support Victoria at New York

British footballer David Beckham carries his daughter Harper Beckham as they arrive at Balthazar restaurant in SoHo, New York City. David and Harper were coming from Victoria Beckham’s fashion show.
Victoria Beckham looks great as she steps out of Balthazar in New York City with her husband David Beckham as they went to eat following her fashion show. Victoria is then seen going to another show at Milk Studios.
For someone who is only 14 months old, little Harper Beckham is quite the fashionista.
And the little one was back at New York Fashion Week with her father David Beckham as her mother Victoria showcased her Spring/Summer 2013 collection.
While Victoria kept it simple in black, her cute daughter looked angelic in a white dress, hair bow and black shoes.
The show, which was at the New York Public Library, marked Harper’s third fashion week appearance – her first being when she only a few weeks old.
Following the show, the trio headed off to Soho restaurant Balthazar to celebrate.
Harper really is following in her trendy mother’s footsteps…
Read more from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

New York Fashion Week spring/summer 2013: DVF get techy with

Diane von Furstenberg showcased a brand new cutting edge piece of wearable technology at her New York Fashion Week show yesterday.
The designer has partnered with Google to showcase the abilities of 'Glass', the internet giant's latest venture - an augmented reality head-mounted display.
The neat pair of glasses consists of a small camera which allows the wearer to film and photograph their viewpoint whilst also interacting with the digital world in a similar way to a smart phone.
"Beauty, style and comfort are as important to Glass as the latest technology" said Google co-founder Sergey Brin. "We are delighted to bring Glass to the runway together with DVF."
The Belgian designer, as well as members of her design and production team and some of her catwalk models, have been sporting Glass for the past week in order to capture the creative process behind the latest collection and catwalk show for a documentary entitled 'DVF through Glass', which will be screened on the label's Goggle+ page and Google's YouTube page this coming Thursday.
"I am so excited to introduce Glass to the fashion world and use this revolutionary technology to give everyone a unique perspective into fashion," said Diane von Furstenberg of the project.
Actress Sarah Jessica Parker tried out the specs after yesterday's show, as did Rupert Murdoch.
It is the first time the glasses have been used by anyone outside of Google, although there are rumours that the headset will soon be available to the public.
Read more from http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Hermione would be horrified: Emma Watson's costume boob

WHEN you hear the phrase "wardrobe malfunction" you naturally think of Kim Kardashian or Miley Cyrus, not Hermione.
But "Harry Potter" star Emma Watson suffered her first public exposure when she attended the premiere of her new movie, "The Perks of Being a Wallflower".
Watson appeared regal in her backless lace dress as she glided down the red carpet at the ArcLight Cinerama Dome in Los Angeles. Her make-up was flawless - red lipstick and dark eyeliner, all complimented by her slicked back hairdo.
But she was undone by one little boob - her left breast slipped out of her dress.
In the coming-of-age film, based on the best-selling novel by Stephen Chbosky, Watson plays the free-spirited Sam, whom the main character falls for.
Read more: http://www.homecomingdressescheap.com

Kelly Brook shows off plenty of skin in near nude lace dress

After getting it wrong so many times so far at London Fashion Week, Kelly Brook finally got it right with her lace dress.
The television presenter was back to her best as she took centre stage on the front row of the Philip Treacy catwalk show, on Sunday.
The 32-year-old looked like a true star as she partly concealed her curves under the lace dress and became the real focus of the show at The Royal Courts Of Justice, in London.
Kelly showed off plenty of skin in the dress as she kept her body covered in a cream underlining.
The fashionista kept her make-up simple as she pulled back her hair into a simple ponytail and accessorised with a pair of plain black heels and a leopard print clutch.
Kelly was over the moon to be attending the show and tweeted ahead of it: LFW Day 3 : Philip Treacy Tonight So excited! True Artist and first show in years !
After taking her seat next to musician Bryan Ferry, she sipped on a cocktail just before the models appeared on the runway.
Kelly's drink wasn't just for the party atmosphere at the show, however, as she was trying desperately to calm her nerves before a very special guest turned up.
Word had spread that international superstar Lady Gaga was to attend the show and the venue was a buzz with anticipation.
With the excitement surrounding Lady Gaga dying down, the actual show finally began and was well received by all.
Burlesque star Dita Von Teese complimented the ostentatious display and Miss Brook shared the sentiments by retweeting: The @PhilipTreacy1 show featuring Michael Jackson's wardrobe was brilliant!
Upon leaving The Royal Courts Of Justice Kelly found it hilarious when her security guard jumped into a taxi and almost left her behind.
The beautiful brunette saw the funny side of things as she was left standing on the roadside moments before the security guard realised he had left her and stopped the car.
Read more: www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com

Kirstie Alley shows off her figure in clinging black dress a

She spends all day every day on the dance floor brushing up her footwork.
But Dancing With The Stars contestant Kirstie Alley loves to dance so much that she has taken to dancing her way home as well.
The actress showed off her fancy moves as she left the studio after a long day rehearsing today.
As she left the Los Angeles dance studio today Kirstie was so tired that she tried to get into the wrong car.
But she had saved enough energy to twizzle around for the watching photographers.
The 61-year-old and her fellow contestants have been working all hours as they get back into shape ahead of the new allstar season of Dancing With The Stars
The U.S. star, who admits to being a chronic yo-yo dieter, showed off her figure in a clinging black wrap dress and leggings.
Having struggled with body confidence in the past, the US star has tried every diet going but has always had a problem with keeping her weight down.
She admitted to having lost having lost a substantial amount of weight during last year’s 10 week show and seems determined to so the same this year.
Kirstie has just a few weeks to perfect her dance skills before the show kicks off in the US, where she’ll be facing completion form other stars including Pamela Anderson, Bristol Palin and Joey Fatone.
Also seen today was actress Sabrina Bryan, who only came 13th in her season of DWTS. She will be hoping her hard work pays off and wins her a higher place.
And professional dancers Maksim Chmerkovskiy and Louis Van Amstel were also in the studio.
Read more: www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com

Sexy in silver! 90210 star Jessica Lowndes dresses to impres

It is not easy to be the shining star among the 90210 bevy of beauties.
But Jessica Lowndes manages just that as she dressed in a stunning silver dress as she filmed perfomance scenes at the Hollywood Bowl today.
Her character on the hit teen show Adrianna Tate-Duncan is a singer, and it seems she will be playing the gig of her life in the forthcoming series of the show.
Her cast mates Jessica Stroup and AnnaLynne McCord were both spotted at the iconic Los Angeles venue as the sequences were filmed today.
But all eyes were on Jessica, who looked stunning in her silver and black short dress, high heels and brushed back hair.
The 23-year-old seemed to be having a fantastic time as she strutted her stuff while surrounded by backing dancers in front of the cameras.
She is of course a singer in real life, and scored a number one hit in the Heatseekers chart last year with Undone.
While she carried the day with her commanding stage presence, he co-stars still managed to look as good as ever.
Jessica Stroup looked magnificent in a red dress, and was seen cheering enthusiastically as her friend tread the boards.
And AnnaLynne McCord was her usual svelte self, showing off her perfect stomach in a tiny high cut top, while a flowing purple dress meant she stayed away from the trashy look.
Read more: www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com

LADY GAGA'S MEATY LOOK

Lady Gaga has raised eyebrows in Amsterdam after hitting the stage wearing a corset made entirely out of meat.
The singer showed off her new curves in the bottomless corset with strapless neckline, matching the look with meat booties.
It’s not the first time the singer has donned an outfit made entirely out of animal product - Gaga's infamous meat dress raised more than a few eyebrows at the VMA's last year - it also caught the disapproving eye of PETA, who commented, "The stunt is bringing lots of people to PETA.org to download a copy of our vegetarian/vegan starter kit, so I guess we should be glad."
Gaga defended her decision to wear the dress by saying it was merely a representation of free will. "As you know, I am the most judgement-free human being on the earth," said the singer. "If we don't stand up for what we believe in and don't stand up for our rights, pretty soon we're going to have as much rights as the meat on our bones."
Several media outlets have also slammed Gaga’s new fuller figure, with the Daily Mail commenting, “the singer - who apparently used to starve herself to fit into her costumes - seemed to be in need of a little more cover around her derrière, with the tight-fitting outfit proving unflattering.”
On the flipside, commented celebs.com, “Gaga's fuller figure could send a positive message to young girls that you don't have to look like a bag of bones to be beautiful.”
It seems Gaga could care less about the controversy however, with the singer recently opening the Philip Treacy show at New York Fashion Week, where she showed off a floral-adorned, helmet-style headpiece.
“Philip Treacy is the greatest milliner in the world,” said the singer.
Read more from www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com

Kanye urges Kim to dress and act like Duchess Catherine

The rapper believes his girlfriend of six months - who shot to fame after making a sex tape with her then boyfriend Ray J - could learn a lot from the British royal's "poise and sophistication" along with her conservative style.

Speaking about the duchess - who was previously known as Kate Middleton - a source told the Daily Star newspaper: "Kanye has been urging Kim to tone down her make-up and style her hair in a more conservative style, like Kate.

"And it's not just Kate's regal look that Kanye wants Kim to mimic. He's also told her that she could learn a thing or two about poise and sophistication from Kate."

Kim recently revealed Kanye has managed to convince her to live her life at a slower pace and focus less on her work and more on her personal life.

She said: "I've slowed down a little bit and for the better. It was a good lesson learned. I now make it a priority to take time out for myself and have private vacations.

"To be in a happy, healthy relationship means everything. It's everything when you want to share your life with someone."

Jones also took financial leadership classes through Dress f

“I first walked into Dress for Success with my head bowed down,” Jones said, her voice cut short by emotion. “I couldn’t imagine that I could receive the help that I needed.”But Jones did receive the help she needed, and she went on to land a paraprofessional job with <a href="http://www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com/night-moves-c-4.html"; title="night moves homecoming dresses">night moves homecoming dresses</a>. She joined Dress for Success’ Professional Women’s Group program and even attended a Worldwide Success Summit in Washington, D.C.“You give me a little help and I will lead the way,” Jones said.

Jones also took financial leadership classes through Dress for Success, which she said helped her clean up her credit and buy a house. She said she is now happy to call Houston home and that she will always be grateful for the opportunities Dress for <a href="http://www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com/homecoming-dresses-2012-c-5.html"; title="affordable homecoming dresses">affordable homecoming dresses</a> gave her.She told the court she was to wear the dress on Eid. After Eid, she again visited the shop and Chaudhry used derogatory language against her when she questioned his departure without delivering her garments.

She prayed to the court to direct the respondent to pay Rs7000 which she had paid in advance, Rs5,000 for the phone calls she made to him and 488,000 as damages for the mental agony she suffered.Chaudhry told The Express Tribune that Fatima had concocted the story. He said he had stitched the suit in time but Fatima did not collect it. He said he had not closed his shop before Eid.Aishwarya said that it is an 'honour and privilege' to be working with <a href="http://www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com/homecoming-dresses-2012-c-5.html"; title="cheap prom dresses 2012">cheap prom dresses 2012</a> and work towards eradicating AIDS/HIV. "I will initially be like a student, holding the hand of the organisation which will lead me to the real picture on the ground," Aishwarya, wearing a chic black dress said at the press conference.

Sofia Vergara shares her Emmy wardrobe malfunction over Twit

The stunning actress found herself in an awkward situation when the back zip of her dress busted open.
Instead trying to cover up the disaster however, the actress saw the funny side of the situation sharing a picture of it on Twitter.
She wrote alongside the picture: "Yes!!!! This happend 20 min before we won!!!! Jajajajja. I luv my life!!!!" [sic]
With a crack team of helpers, Sofia was able to get her dressed fixed just in time to accept her award alongside the cast of 'Modern Family'.
Later on the star took to Twitter again to thank her wardrobe team for their quick work.
She posted: "20 min Modern Family won!! Dress malfuncion !!! Thank you emergency team!!"[sic]
Before the mishap, the 40-year-old looked flawless as she posed on the red carpet for the paps.
The teal Zuhair Murad cut-out figure hugging gown showed off Sofia's perfect shape and tiny waist.
She teamed up the outfit with elegant silver jewellery while she wore her hair in loose waves.
Sofia's Modern Family co-star Eric Stonestreet is currently rumored to be dating Charlize Theron.
From www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com

Anne Hathaway's Wedding Dress Revealed

Anne Hathaway will walk down the aisle in a Valentino wedding dress. The designer confirmed that he has created the gown that the actress will wear to marry her actor fiancé Adam Shulman.

"She's a very good friend of mine," Valentino Garavani told E! News. "She's like my daughter."

The Les Misérables star has long been a loyal fan of the Italian designer, having worn Valentino on the red carpet on many occasions. Garavani and Hathaway attended a reception at the New York City Ballet together just last week.

The 29-year-old confirmed her engagement to Shulman back in November last year - showcasing a diamond engagement ring designed by her husband-to-be.

But while we know that Hathaway will say her vows in a bespoke Valentino bridal gown, no other details of the wedding have yet to emerge - the actress says she's been "too busy" to plan it. Although if she's already got the dress planned, perhaps the big day isn't too far off now.

Take a look back at some of the most bridal-inspired designs from the Valentino catwalks in the gallery to the left - we wonder if Anne's gown will look like any of these?

Read more from www.dressesforhomecomingcheap.com
